trans-unit.target: 一个配置文件的例子可以是这样的。

trans-unit.source: A small CLI utility to monitor bbb usage
trans-unit.target: 一个小型的CLI工具,用于监控bbb的使用情况。

trans-unit.source: A small python based CLI utility to monitor BigBlueButton-Usage.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于python的小型CLI工具,用于监控BigBlueButton-Usage。

trans-unit.source: Clone the repo:
trans-unit.target: Clone the repo:

trans-unit.source: Configuration
trans-unit.target: 配置

trans-unit.source: For help run:
trans-unit.target: 为帮助运行。

trans-unit.source: Install with pip3
trans-unit.target: 用pip3安装

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have poetry installed. Install instruction for poetry can be found here. From inside the project directory run:
trans-unit.target: 确保您已安装诗歌。诗歌的安装说明可以在这里找到。从项目目录内部运行：

trans-unit.source: Run bbbmon config --new to create a new default configuration file. bbbmon will always ask you before it creates or overwrites anything.
trans-unit.target: 运行 bbbmon config --new 创建一个新的默认配置文件。bbbmon会在创建或覆盖任何内容之前始终询问您。

trans-unit.source: Run bbbmon with:
trans-unit.target: 运行bbbmon与。

trans-unit.source: Run with poetry (without pip)
trans-unit.target: 诗意的奔跑(不含pip)

trans-unit.source: The easiest way to install bbbmon is to install it from the Python Package Index (PyPi). This project uses python poetry for dependency management, so you could also run it without installing the package system wide, see instructions below.
trans-unit.target: 安装bbbmon的最简单方法是从Python软件包索引（PyPi）安装它。该项目使用python poetry进行依赖项管理，因此您也可以在不安装整个系统包的情况下运行它，请参阅下面的说明。

trans-unit.source: The section names in the square brackets can be chosen arbitrarily (as long as they are unique) and will be used as display names (they support utf-8). It makes sense to keep them short as they can be used for filtering and/or ordering:
trans-unit.target: 方括号中的部分名称可以任意选择(只要它们是唯一的),并将被用作显示名称(它们支持utf-8)。保持它们的简短是有意义的,因为它们可以用于过滤和/或排序。

trans-unit.source: Then run with:
trans-unit.target: 然后用跑的。

trans-unit.source: This works as long as there is no other command starting with the same letters.
trans-unit.target: 只要没有其他以相同字母开头的命令,就可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Within the config you can define one or more endpoints with running bbb instances – each with it's secret and bigbluebutton-URL. You can find the secret on your server in it's config-file via
trans-unit.target: 在配置中，您可以定义一个或多个运行bbb实例的端点-每个端点都有secret和bigbluebutton-URL。您可以通过以下命令在其配置文件中找到服务器上的秘密

trans-unit.source: bbbmon
trans-unit.target: bbbbbmon

trans-unit.source: bbbmon supports command abbreviations – these commands produce the same result:
trans-unit.target: bbbmon支持命令缩写-这些命令产生相同的结果：
